text.text: Welcome to Blockbench 4.4 - The Brush Update!

features.title: Custom Brushes
features.text: Create custom brushes, change the blend mode and brush shape, or use the brand new Copy Brush!

features.title: 2D Image Editor
features.text: Edit textures or create pixel art in the new built-in 2D image editor!

features.title: Validator
features.text: The new Validator will automatically spot common issues with your model so that you can catch them early!
